channel.title: Where to next? advice for a main
channel.description:
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=490502.0;attach=19618;image[/img] [i]Updated stats: 1st May 2011[/i]
what do you think I should do next? I am unsure really, I have about 50m spare cash so 95 prayer or herblore isnt on the cards atm dispite how much i want it.

item.title: Where to next? advice for a main
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

i have over 10k gold (shitty i know) and around 1k each of the others, should get me around 75 summoning i think, will probably go killing loads of waterfiends or dust devils for chrims.

Read full topic
item.source: Where to next? advice for a main

item.title: Where to next? advice for a main
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

Get summoning up via slayer while training def.

Summoning is useful for bosses.

Read full topic
item.source: Where to next? advice for a main

item.title: Where to next? advice for a main
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

i would probably use baby dragon bones in my house on g alter, so about 150m or something. I am currently on my way to 95 herblore, im level 86 at the moment and have the rest banked. im debating weather to spend the extra 70m and get 99 but unsure of it yet!

I can afford the prayer but then i will be pretty skint and have about 50m left, but it will mean i can go bossing and pretty much solo the gwd bosses and get profit++

Also RE Quests, I have a large number of them done, around 250 quest points. once i have done all of the reqâ€™s for curse prayers I will have more, generally i only do a quest if i want its rewards.

Read full topic
item.source: Where to next? advice for a main
